meanings.definition: Superlative form of carrot, meaning most like a carrot.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit chose the carrotiest carrot from the garden.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the vegetables, the carrotiest one was the most orange.
meanings.sent3: The carrotiest carrot in the bunch did a little dance.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as orange as the carrotiest carrot in the field.
meanings.sent5: The carrotiest carrot gleamed brightly in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of carrot, meaning more like a carrot than something else.
meanings.sent1: This vegetable is carrotier than the others in the salad.
meanings.sent2: The orange color of the pumpkin was not as carrotiest as the carrot.
meanings.sent3: The carrotiest cake at the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were as corny as the carrotiest puns.
meanings.sent5: The carrotiest scent filled the kitchen as the soup cooked.
